Reviews.Title: “Perfect London base for your London holiday”
Reviews.Author: Septemberdawn1958
Reviews.Content: noticed arrived friendly helpful staff reception allowed store daughters wheelchair convenient helped lift hotel attractively decorated despite eve peaceful clean warm comfortable extremely nice twin beds neat attractive covers ample storage space provided kettle teacoffee requirements disappointed bathrooms hotels absolutely lovely clean warm bright bath shower water ran hot times able bath afternoon showers returned incredible firework displays thames lovely fresh soft towels tiny soaps shower gels provided toilet spotless paper cover view lovely looked tops buildings awesome skyline london front lovely views square gardens slept perfectly morning downstairs sample breakfast little bare clean tidy food waitress helpful nice attractive fault service position hotel convenient transport stations corner bus stops five minutes door plenty eating entertainment road enjoyed stay rebooked queens jubilee weekend intend hotel downside experienced steps front lack disabled entrance price pay lovely hotel perfect base london holiday

Reviews.Title: “You Get What You Pay For.”
Reviews.Author: marcuslikus
Reviews.Content: airline miles stay actually spent money id probably clean public spotless couldve fresh paint stayed standard single american standards ive actually italy location fantastic 2 minute walk paddington picked hotel location foremost secondly didnt eat air miles front desk staff perfunctory werent rude werent overtly friendly stay recommend stay

Reviews.Title: “A good Hotel for a family”
Reviews.Author: Kachanovka9
Reviews.Content: whilst usual hotel basic bedded night difference leave ones luggage entrance ones own risk choice breakfast except continental english consisted egg sausage piece bacon oh horror baked beans bring beans requested

Reviews.Title: “staying in London”
Reviews.Author: Dirk K
Reviews.Content: hotel located paddington 3 min paddington station location perfect reception friendly hotel updating dripping airconditioner average mentioned leak bathroom days stayed breakfast plane staff location hotel weathered

Reviews.Title: “Basic”
Reviews.Author: goldfisharenice
Reviews.Content: pleasant staff exterior lobby etc disappointment looking secondhand pieces furniture scattered afterthought centrallylocated stayed street night cheaper nicer hotel wouldnt recommend

Reviews.Title: “London Stay”
Reviews.Author: RosieR4
Reviews.Content: booked hotel 10 nights convenient tube mainline station plenty restaurants cafes square bathroom ventilation musty nice soap clean adequate didnt spend lot time breakfast kitchen benefit toaster found staff reception obliging lift strange request hair dryer reception borrowed iron ironing board ironed bed

Reviews.Title: “Quiet and cean”
Reviews.Author: ARISTEIDIS P
Reviews.Content: hotel 2 situated 200 metres station easy connection heathrow airport near centre citythe hotel cleanthe alsothere free coffee roomthe quietthe staff reception restaurant politethe bad breakfasti ate days fried mall saussage served dish possibility hotel waqs money

Reviews.Title: “A good option for a good value stay - good breakfast too”
Reviews.Author: sirduncs
Reviews.Content: ive stayed nights week space fortnight option comfy budget hotel friendly staff free wifi decent breakfast 2 minute walk paddington station week 1 single floor 5 tiny clean quiet week 2 double 4th floor bigger tea coffee facilities comfier plus clean appointed furnished double glazing exterior noise greatly reduced considering paddington station corner floor noise reduced dont people banging doors etc stayed hotel norfolk square breakfast theres supplement cooked english breakfast plenty eat toast cereal breakfast decent size wifi free didnt 5th floor fine 4th floor lobby stayed

Reviews.Title: “Average Hotel, Good Location”
Reviews.Author: bygeorgew
Reviews.Content: booked canadian travel agency ok bit noisy lobby free wireless internet connection free positive reception soso breakfast plentiful location near paddington tube station convenient getting reception staff friendly helpfulthis hotel square hotels square looking cheap ok value elsewhere

Reviews.Title: “perfect for Paddington - lots of options in the area”
Reviews.Author: JDsale
Reviews.Content: stayed day flew heathrow perfect clean welllocated hotel minute walk train heathrow lots dining options close vicinity quiet night waitress served breakfast perfectly acceptable stay option staying airport due proximity heathrow trains eating drinking options

Reviews.Title: “Good Location - Enjoyed Our Stay”
Reviews.Author: Cundy
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 6 nights situated quiet street lovely park front found clean size bed comfortable found staff helpful requests breakfast morning choice continental english enjoyable short 5 minute walk paddington station

Reviews.Title: “Good Value, Great Location - Would stay again!”
Reviews.Author: KatLM
Reviews.Content: stayed 5 nights found reception helpful checking wasnt ready arrived leave bags lobby secure luggage safe worry expecting sleep fine elevator 3rd floor initially unhappy elevator loud closing awake night troubles sleeping english breakfast nice continental selection expect cereal toast juice wireless internet sometimes friends 2nd floor lobby internet free whilst cut acceptable located near paddington station pleasant looking square found location couldnt considering price range definately reccommend stay

Reviews.Title: “Good location, Great Value”
Reviews.Author: Bruce_McKinley
Reviews.Content: stayed jan 2010 travelling throughout europe location fantastic minutes walk paddington station catch tube local attractions staff friendly included english breakfast nice start day aware elevator noisy due minimal amount floor affect sleep included wifi lower floors comfortable lounges lobby sit own laptop computer overall value discount booking online

HotelInfo.Name: Chrysos Hotel
